forum.content:
As the title, I'm looking for somebody to chat in English by phone call. The purpose is nothing but practicing speaking.
In fact, my English speaking is not frequent, that's why I'm here. What I have is only courage.
I like exercise, especially triathlon. On the other hand, I keep some enthusiasm in graphic design and illustrator. I like travel, having been to Japan, UK, France, Thailand... These are my basic info.
If you want to get the next step and share something with me, just add me as friend with your purpose.
Maybe we can set some topic, subjects in advance, and prepare some words to chat in the phone. That would be better for both of us :)

*If you only want to improve English writing ... that's ok, but time is limit so maybe the response wouldn't be in a rapid time.

Anyway, nice to meet you~ be free at home!
forum.title: Looking for English speaker
